132b3(mdo sde): gshegs pas rnar bar pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang mang tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen te khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas rdor thar pa shes pa 'gog
132b4(mdo sde): bshes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu ma khyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas rdor thar pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang rung
132b5(mdo sde): tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// kham 'dag de la de bzhin/ gshegs pas rnar thar pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 
132b6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na/ rmi lam ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i bskyed mos tshal du 'gro ba'i 'bras bu ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rjer tha rob shes
132b7(mdo sde): pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shis pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas ting 'dzin shes pa ni ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 
132b8(mdo sde): 'di lnga snga dper na/ rmi lam na gos bdag gi snam bu bltab pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsom ste// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ting 'dzin shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang mang
133a1(mdo sde): / dud ltar rab tus khyen te/ khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas ring 'dzin shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab su mkhyen pa 'di lnga ste dpe la
133a2(mdo sde): na gos bdag gi rnam bu bltab pa shes po ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ting 'dzin shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji sprad pa nyid kyang ming tsam
133a3(mdo sde): dude ltar rab tu malen to// khom bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas ting 'dzin shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu ma ben te/ 'di lnga ste dper na rmi lam na gos bdag gi sngal
133a4(mdo sde): bu brkyang ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ da ba zhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ting 'dzin shes pa 'gog bau shes pa/ ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du ltar rab tu
133a5(mdo sde): mkhyen te// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas ting 'dzin shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji ltar rab tu mkhyen te 'di lta ste dbar na rmi laman
133a6(mdo sde): gso bdag go snam bu'i rin shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ting 'dzin shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang
133a7(mdo sde): ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas snyems par 'jug pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ rmi la ma na sman pas nad pa'i
133a8(mdo sde): khams mnyam pa shes shing rab tu shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas snyoms par 'jug pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang tsal du de ltar rab
133b1(mdo sde): tu maben to// khami bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas snyoms par 'jug pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na rmi lam na sman pas rA
133b2(mdo sde): bo'i sprin gyi rnam pa shes par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas snyoms par 'jug pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid
133b3(mdo sde): kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas snyoms par 'jug pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dang
133b4(mdo sde): na rmi lam na smin pas nad pa nad dang bral bar rab tu shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas snyoms par 'jug pa shes pa
133b5(mdo sde): 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ rmi lam na sman pas nad pa nad dang bral bar rab tu shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ 
133b6(mdo sde): bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas snyoms par 'jug pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// kham bdag de la de bzhin gshegs
133b7(mdo sde): pas snyoms par 'jug pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ rmi la mau na sman pas nad pa'i gso ba'i dbang
133b8(mdo sde): yang dag par rab tu shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs paso snyoms par 'jug pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes po ji
134a1(mdo sde): snang pa nyid kyang ming tsam du da ltar rab tu mkhar te/ khaMm bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhan te 'di
134a2(mdo sde): lnga ste dper na rmi lam na sprin gyi dra ba byung 'ji snyed pa nyid ni matsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ri 'a tsal du rab
134a3(mdo sde): tu mkhan to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dpe ra ra/ rmi lam na mtshan mo
134a4(mdo sde): grang ba'i nang bar gyi dus kyis tsher nyi ma gung byung ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gsheg sa pas kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa kur 'byung ba
134a5(mdo sde): shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du rab du mkhyen/ to// kham bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas kun nas nyon mongs pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu
134a6(mdo sde): mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ rmi lam ni mtshan mo'i mun pa dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa 'gog pa

134a8(mdo sde): lhar rab tu mkhyen te 'di lta ste dper na rmi lam na mtshon mo mun gnag la snang ba byung ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas kun nas nyon mongs pa shA
134b1(mdo sde): pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam dudade ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas rnar byang ba shes pa 'di ltar rab
134b2(mdo sde): su mkhan te/ 'di lta ste dper na rmi lam nang mus long gis gzugs mthong ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du dri bzhin gshegs pas rnor byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa

134b4(mdo sde): lam na dmus long gi mig gso ba'i dpod shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa sa rnar byang ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa
134b5(mdo sde): nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par byang ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhan te/ 
134b6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper ni/ rmi lami na klog byung nas med pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par byang ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid
134b7(mdo sde): kyang mang tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// kham bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas rnar byang ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu maben te/ 'di
134b8(mdo sde): lta ste dper na rlung yod pa'i rmi lam na sprin dang bral ba'i shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni mngo tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rnar bang ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur
135a1(mdo sde): ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gnas pa shes pa 'di ltar
135a2(mdo sde): rab tu mkhan tu/ 'di lta ste dper na/ rmi lam na rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu dbang bskar ba shes pa dzaM snyad pa nyid ni ming tsal ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gnas

135a4(mdo sde): na rmi lam na rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu dbang bskur ba'i yo pad shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gnas pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji skad ba

135a6(mdo sde): rmilam na rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i bu gzhon nu da bral ba ji skad pa nyid ni ming tsam ste de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas TIr gnas pa shes pa 'gog pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming

135a8(mdo sde): rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rmi lam mdabang bskur grub pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gnas pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam she
135b1(mdo sde): baji snyed pa nyid kyang ring tsam dud ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag dri la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi mtha' shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmil
135b2(mdo sde): rna ba ga pa dang / dga' ba dang / brtses pa dang / yongasu spyad pa dag rje su dran pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi mtha' shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang mi
135b3(mdo sde): tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// kha mi bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi mtha' shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam
135b4(mdo sde): na bro me ben 'dus pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi mtha' shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhan to//

135b6(mdo sde): du dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nas ming tsam gyi bar du'o// kham bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi mtha' shes pa 'gog par
135b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na nye du dngo mi ldan pa'i shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
135b8(mdo sde): bas sngon gyi mtha' shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang mang tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhan to// khami bdag de la nga bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa
136a1(mdo sde): 'di ltar rab tu ma khan te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na lha'i gnas rjesu dran pa dang / skye ba'i rigs rje su dran pa dang / longs spyod rjesu dran pa dang / 
136a2(mdo sde): mdza' bshas dang phrad pa rjes dran pa dang / mi mdza' ba dang drod po rje su dran pa dang / mtsho dang 'bral ba rjesu dran pa ji snyed pa 'di ni ming tsam snga/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngan
136a3(mdo sde): gyi gnas kyi khams shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du da ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar
136a4(mdo sde): rab tu ma byan te/ 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yul na gnas pa'i rgyu dang / 'dza' bshes dang phrad pa'i rdzu dang / mi 'dza' ba dang phrad pa'i rgyu dang chu dang 'bral
136a5(mdo sde): ba'i rgyu ji srid pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin ga/ shags pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa kun 'byung ba sha sa pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mabya
136a6(mdo sde): tota khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu mi'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yul na gnas
136a7(mdo sde): pi'i rgyu dang bral ba dang / rigs la gnas pa'i rgyu dang bral ba dang / mdza' bshes la gnas pa'i rgyu dang bral ba dang / mi 'dza' ba la gnas pa'i mya dang bral ba dang / mchi la gnas
136a8(mdo sde): pa'i rgyu dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ nga bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen
136b1(mdo sde): ta khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lnga ste dper nu/ sbru la'i skyes bu'i raM lang
136b2(mdo sde): thabs la rabs pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhir du bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de
136b3(mdo sde): ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i mtha'i shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na/ skyes pa'i rig
136b4(mdo sde): la 'jug pa dang skye ba'i yul du 'jug pa dang / mdza' shes dang phrad par 'jug pa dang / mi mdza' ba dang phrad pa 'jug pa dang / mtsho yongasu shes pa 'jug pa ji snyed
136b5(mdo sde): ba nyid ni rang tsam snying bzhin du de bzhini gshegs pas phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin pa

136b7(mdo sde): ba'i rigs la 'jug pa'i rgyu shes pa dang / mdza' bshes dang phrang bar 'jug pa'i rgyu shes pa dang / mi mdzem pa dang phrad par 'jug pa'i rgyu shes pa dang / mtsho yongasu shes
136b8(mdo sde): par 'jug pa shes pa'i rgyu ji snang pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam dung
137a1(mdo sde): ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta sde dpar bsdu pa'i
137a2(mdo sde): skyes bu'i rmi la la na 'jug pa'i rgyu dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming

137a4(mdo sde): ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lamo na/ yul na gnas pa'i ting 'dzin shes pa dang / skye ba'i rigs yang dag par gab pa shes pa dang / mdza' bshas dang pad pa yang dag par grub par
137a5(mdo sde): shes pa dang / mi mdza' ba dang bral ba yang dag par grub ba shes pa dang / mtsho yong su shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ 
137a6(mdo sde): de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas phyi mi'i mtha' shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhan to// khyim bdag de bzhin sa bya
137a7(mdo sde): pas 'chi ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yul na 'chi ba shes pa dang / mdza' bshes dang bral ba shes pa dang / mi mdzA
137a8(mdo sde): ba dang bral ba shes pa dang / mtshe dang bral ba shes pa ji snad pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'chib shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu dbye/ 
137b1(mdo sde): tong kham bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi kham na/ 'chi ba shes pa bsags
137b2(mdo sde): ba'i rgyu dang / yul ngan par gnas pa bsags pa'i rgyu dang / mdza' bshes dang phrad pa bsags pa'i rgyud ngo // mi mdza' ba dang phrang ba bsngags pa'i rgyu dang / mtsho yongasu shes pa bsags
137b3(mdo sde): ba'i rgyu ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen te// kham bdag de la de bzhin
137b4(mdo sde): gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhan te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na/ yul gnas pa'i rgyung ngo bral ba dang / mdza' ba
137b5(mdo sde): shes la gnas pa'i rgyu dang bral ba dang / mi mdza' ba la gnas pa'i rgyu dang bral ba dang / mi tsha yongasu shes pa'i rgyu dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ring tsal ste/ de ba'i
137b6(mdo sde): gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// kham bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa 'geg par 'gyur
137b7(mdo sde): ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lnga ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi la pa na yul na gnas pa yid byung ba dang / mdza' bshes dang phrad pa yid byung ba dang / mtsho la gnas
137b8(mdo sde): pa yid byung ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhar te// 
138a1(mdo sde): khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas skyeb shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na sU ra'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na/ mar med yang ye shes pa ji snyed pa
138a2(mdo sde): nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas skye bo shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs par skye ba shes pa kun
138a3(mdo sde): 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lan mar med dang / mar me'i bya ba shes po ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
138a4(mdo sde): bas skye ba shes pa kun 'thung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhi dgashegs pas skye ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa
138a5(mdo sde): 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skye sa bu'i rmi lam na mar mo'i bya ba nyams pa ji skad pa/ nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa
138a6(mdo sde): skye ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lar shes
138a7(mdo sde): po 'di ltar rab tu mkhan te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na ba ba shes pa 'gog pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsal ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gsheg
138a8(mdo sde): bas skyes pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes
138b1(mdo sde): ba'adi ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ra'i skyes bu'i rmil pa na chub chen po shes pa ji snyed pa zhing ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhir gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa
138b2(mdo sde): ji snyed pa nyid kyang ro ji tsam du de ltar rab tu reyin te/ khyor bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhan te/ 'di lnga ste dper
138b3(mdo sde): na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na char chen po 'bab pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni mang tsam ste/ de bzhin du de gshegs pas 'dod pa'i ba'i zag pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa
138b4(mdo sde): ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhan to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhan te/ 'di
138b5(mdo sde): lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam ma/ chu bo chen po rnam par bskams pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag
138b6(mdo sde): pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang meng tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen te// kham bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam
138b7(mdo sde): shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na/ chu bo chen po rnar bskams pa shes shing mkhas pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du bzhin ga
138b8(mdo sde): pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam dred ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas srid pa'i zag
139a1(mdo sde): pa shes pa 'di lngar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na/ rgyal snying bab pa'i shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste de bzhin du de bzhin gshe
139a2(mdo sde): pas srid pa'i zag pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mngon to// khami bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas srid pa'i zag pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di

139a4(mdo sde): pakun 'byung po shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsa mo du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gsheg das pas srid pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di

139a8(mdo sde): bu'i rmi lam na mtshan mun pa mun nag gi nang na sbrul gdug pa'i za ma tog rnyed pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas lta ba'i zag pa shes pa ji snyed
139b1(mdo sde): pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// kham bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas lta ba'i zag pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgra

139b3(mdo sde): bshos pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas lta ba'i zag pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta

141b8(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper ra rmi la mar brag ci'i don shes te na shes pa kun 'byung ba shes/ dar shes pa 'gog pa shas don shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes/ chos shes pa stan 'thung ba shas
142a1(mdo sde): 'gog pa shes chos shes pa 'gog par 'gyu A ma tshus me dngas pa'i tshig shes pa kun 'byung ba shes nges pa'i tshig shes pa 'gog pa shes/ nges pa'i tshig shes pa

143a8(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa'i shes pa khong du chud pa ji snyed pa nyid ni meng tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa
143b1(mdo sde): med pa nyid kyang mang tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dpe ma m+bu
143b2(mdo sde): ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na/ dad pa'i dbang po dang bral ba dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang bral ba ji snyed pa 'di ni ming tsamo ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshig
143b3(mdo sde): pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyimi bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa kun 'byung
143b4(mdo sde): bshes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na/ nga rgyal gyi shes pa la 'jug pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de
143b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shos pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim dag de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin ga
143b6(mdo sde): pi dbang po shes pa 'gag pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhan te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na/ nga rgyal la dbang byed pa dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du
143b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa 'gog par
143b8(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i las shes pa'i da ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i la man lam rnyed pa ji snyed pa 'di ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin
144a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyi ni ma dung ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ khim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas lus
144a2(mdo sde): kyi las shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na lus skyes pa shes pa de bzhin du bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa ji snyed pa nyid
144a3(mdo sde): kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhon to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgra li'i skyes
144a4(mdo sde): bu'i rmi lam nA bye ba la 'jug pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ring tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa zhing kyang ming la
144a5(mdo sde): dung ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gsheg/ sa pas lus kyi las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di lta ra rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i
144a6(mdo sde): rmilam na/ til mar gyi mar me bus bzang cing zhi ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa zhid kya
144a7(mdo sde): ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa 'geg par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste/ dper
144a8(mdo sde): na sgyu mo'i skyes bu'i blo lom na lus kyi las yongasu shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes po 'gog par 'gyur ba'i
144b1(mdo sde): las shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu ma byar to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa 'di ltar rab tu maben te/ 'di lta ste dper// m+b+ha
144b2(mdo sde): ra'i skyes bu'i rmilam na/ brdzun du smra ba 'am// brdzun du smra bo las ldog pa 'ang/ phra ma'i ngag gam/ pha ma'i ngag las ldeg pa 'am/ tshig rtsub po'i ngag gam/ tshig nub po'i ngag
144b3(mdo sde): las ldog pa 'am/ tshig kyal pa 'am/ tshig kyal ba las ldog pa ji skad pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam
144b4(mdo sde): du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// kham bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu mi'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na/ 
144b5(mdo sde): tshad ma bstan pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ngagra gi las shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de
144b6(mdo sde): ltar rab tu mkhyen to// kham bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lami
144b7(mdo sde): na ngag gi las shes pa 'geg pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsa
144b8(mdo sde): du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper// ska ma'i
145a1(mdo sde): // skyes bu'i rmilam mthos pa dang ma thos pa yongasasu shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste de bzhin du bu n+d+ha gshegs pas dag gi las shes pa 'jog pa
145a2(mdo sde): ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas yid kyi las shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste
145a3(mdo sde): dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na bar snang la ri mo 'dri ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas yid kyi las shes pa ji stod pa nyid kyang ming tsam
145a4(mdo sde): du de ltar rab tu mabyon to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin ga/ shegs pas yid kyi las shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes
145a5(mdo sde): bu'i rmi lam mo ro mo 'dra ba'i bzo shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa na sa/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ mang tsam gyi bar dul khyim bdag
145a6(mdo sde): de la de bzhin gshegs pas yid kyi las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhan to// 'di lta ste/ da bar na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na/ ri mo 'dri ba'i skal ba she
145a7(mdo sde): pa ji snyed pa nyid ni mang tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te ming tsom gyi bar duro// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas yid kyi las shes pa la/ 
145a8(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na slob dpon gyis bstan pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de
145b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas yid kyi las shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lasu shes 'ji snyed pa'id kyang ming tsam de ltar rab tu ma khyen te// bang po bcu ga dag pa sa na
145b2(mdo sde): la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon du 'gro ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam ni/ sngor mgyags pa ji snyed pa nyid ro bong tsamo ste/ de bde
145b3(mdo sde): du bzhin gshegs pas sngon du 'gro ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang mang tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen te// khyim padag de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngan du 'gro ba shes pa kun 'byung
145b4(mdo sde): ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu babani ga 'di lta ste dper na// snu ma'i skyes bu'i mo lan phyogs dag tu don gyi bsal pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste// de ba nod dung bzhi gshegs
145b5(mdo sde): pas sngon du 'ge ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang mang tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyer to// khi bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas sder de 'gro ba shes pa
145b6(mdo sde): 'geg pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na/ sngon du mgyogs pa shi ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ring tsam ste/ de bzhin deng bzhin gshegs pas
145b7(mdo sde): sngon du 'gro ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ma tsam du de ltar rab tu 'khyer te/ khar bdag de la de bzhir gshegs pas sngon du 'gro ba shelas 'gyur ba'i lam shes
145b8(mdo sde): ba 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te 'di lta ste rer na/ smra ba'i skyes bu'i rmi la men phyogs dag tu don grub pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsal te/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngarang
146a1(mdo sde): // 'gro ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu maben te/ kham pa dag de la de bzhin gshegs pas rje su 'ag pa shes
146a2(mdo sde): pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhan te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ rmi lam na rnam par sad par byed pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rjes 'jug pa shes pa ji skad
146a3(mdo sde): pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas rjes 'jug pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen to// 'di lta ste dper na sgyu
146a4(mdo sde): ma'i skyes bu'i rmi la ma na nAr srang shri pa snying po nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rjesu 'jug pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tser
146a5(mdo sde): dude ltar rab tu mkhyar to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin pa/ shegs pas rjesu 'jug pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu ma bar te/ 'di lta ste dper na smra ba'i
146a6(mdo sde): skyes bu'i rmi lam ra pa shi ba ji snyed pa nyidadi ni ming tsam ste// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rjesu 'jug pa shes pa 'gag pa shes paji snying po zhid kyang ming tsam dung ltar rab tu
146a7(mdo sde): tu maben to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas rjesu 'jug pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lab shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyer te/ 'di lnga ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu
146a8(mdo sde): grol por mor thun pa'i rtsa ba yang dag par bcad pa ni mi 'tsham ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ mi 'tsham gyi bong du'i khyir bdag de la de bzhin gshegs
146b1(mdo sde): pus yengasu mi nyams pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu 'khor pa/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam la dug 'thungs pa'i ci sman pa lus par byed pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming

146b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas yongasu mi nyams pa shes pa ji lha 'thung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar ra ba tu mkhyen to// kham bdag de la de gshegs pas yengasu

146b6(mdo sde): de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas yesu mi nyams pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ring tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas

147b8(mdo sde): gangasaM ri'i rgyal po'i drang na/ mnyan yod ces bya ba grong khor chen po de na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu rgyal bu rgyal bod kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas bin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bcom ldan
148a1(mdo sde): 'das de ltar bzhug so// de skad ces smras pa dang / khyim bdag pa mkharan gyis lag gi bla tshe dang ldan pa gang po la 'di skad ces smras// gang po ma' yod kyi

148b8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dag btsal pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gzhal bas bzang po lo spyan drangs kyis/ de la khyed kyis 'as
149a1(mdo sde): // ba ci yod pa dang / mthu ci yed pa'i lus kyi nal tar bya ba la brtson pa dang ldan par gyis shig/ khyim bdag bya mAkhan gyis de skad ces sbas pa dang / mdza' ba shes
149a2(mdo sde): nyedu dang / sdug gi gnyen mtsham dang / bran po dang / brang po dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dag gis khyim bdag pa mkhan la 'di skad ces sbas/ khaM redag spros so// khyim bdag 'a stsa
149a3(mdo sde): so// gang bcom ldan 'das de mthong bar zhal zas bzang po la spya 'dren dag/ kha'i bdag pha ma bar gyis bac+doMs de sman 'dren no zhesu gsal ngo skad ces spras pa dang / khom bdag pa
149a4(mdo sde): mkhan gyis mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang 'du dang / sA ga gnyan mtshams dang / bran pa dang / bran mo dang / las bye da pa dang / zho shas 'tshe ba dag la 'di skad ces smras// 
149a5(mdo sde): grogs pa dag bcom ldan 'das de sangs rgyas kyi yon dpag tu med pa dag brnyes te/ des na nga'i sems mkhan nas gan // de dag mgu zhing dga' la yid rangs pa
149a6(mdo sde): dang rab tu dga' zhing bde ba dang / yid bde ba bskyed nas// de'i mtshan mo bza' ba dang / bca' ba bzang zhing rab tu mang po mngon par yang dag par byas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de pe 'dreng
149a7(mdo sde): kyi dusu nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ smig ma'i sdum bu'i 'khor gyi khams ga la ba der gsheg so// de'i tshe smig ma'i sngam po'i 'khor gyi khyams na tshe dang ljon pa
149a8(mdo sde): kun dga' bo dang / dge slong rab tu rang ba dag dang lhan cig tu 'dus nas 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun
149b1(mdo sde): dga' ba seng la/ banyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po na dge slong nye bar gnas shing 'khod pa ji snyed pa de dag theng rim gro'i gnas 'das nas nga la sgror cig/ tshe dang ldan kun dga' bas

151b8(mdo sde): phrag brgyad dag bac+doMs la lta ba'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po nas bskyod// klu'i rgyal po lha mdzes la sogs pa klu dang phyur phrag gis bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang
152a1(mdo sde): / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bskyod// klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa klu du drur phrag dgu dag bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'argyar mo chan po nas bskyed

152b1(mdo sde): bral la sogs pa klu dang phyur phrag dgu nas/ de banan du sbyar te kA'i rgyu bo leng chen la sogs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rab tu gdung byed la sogs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs

155a1(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyar sngar song nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// tshe dang ldan pa po'i dag la

155a8(mdo sde): bar spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// skye bo zed bde bas bde ldan pas// de yis legs pa'i las de ngas pas na// bde ba'i lam gyis mya ngan 'das reg 'gyur// ston pa'i gsung gis mdzes pa da
155b1(mdo sde): dga' nas// de'i skad cig sa steng phus btsugs te// gzhal med dga' ba'i sems ni dad pas su// 'jig rten sgron ma 'dren la phyag 'tshal byed// ston pa blo yis mkhas la phyag 'tshal// 'gro
155b2(mdo sde): ba kun las nges 'byung dag 'tsha'o// 'jigs med bye dag pa la phyag 'tshal// de gshegs gzhan min gsung la phyag 'tsha'o// da nas klu'i rgyal po lnga mdzes kyis bac+doMs la tshigasu pa'i
155b3(mdo sde): dbangs kyis zhus pa// 'od mdzad spyan sdug legs pa'i spyan monga' ba// blo dag nyon mongs tshogs las rnam grol zhing / ye shes dri med spyod yul khong la ni// spyad pa spyong tshe rnam par shA
155b4(mdo sde): mo nu// lha dang thecas pa'i 'jig rten sman slad du// ji ltar spyad na byang chub ni 'tshal zhing // mi mchog dam pa dag gi spyod sbyong ga/ yod 'os da dag bdag la bka' stsal
155b5(mdo sde): stsol// rgyal ba de yi rdul bcom dbang po bsdams// 'dod ba'i 'ching las thugs ni rnam grol ba'i// dgongs pa su de nyid sems kyi rjes 'jug pa// thugs ni ma
155b6(mdo sde): dkrugs des ni lung ston pa// mkhas pas dge ba dag ni spyad pa'i phyir/ srog gi phying yang yid ni mi ldog cing // rtag tu spyod tshe nyon mongs med yid kyis// lus dang ngag gis
155b7(mdo sde): dge ma'am spyod pa/ de yis legs pa'i las de byas pa na// 'a khor po'i 'grol spyod pa rnam dag ste/ u yi nang nas pad+ma skye bltar// gos pa med cing byang chub yang dag 'grub/ 'angs
155b8(mdo sde): gsung gi lha yi mdzes pa klu/ de ni dga' zhing logs par mgu ba su// de yis skad cig sa la dbus bcugs te// sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog la phyag 'tshal bang // thub pa
156a1(mdo sde): / 'jig rten gsum la sman mdzad pa// blo gros nges par zhi la phyag 'tshalo// spyad pa spyod tshe khyod kyi rjes slob cing ka/ byang chub mi g.yo yid ni bskyed par bgyi// se de/ 
156a2(mdo sde): du spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// lus dang sreg ni de bzhin btang na su// sdug bsngal thar bad sangs rgyas 'gyur ba dang // ngang chub zhi pa bla leng thob par bgyi// klu de'i bsamo pa thugasu chud ras
156a3(mdo sde): su rgyal ba dag lus rgyal ba 'dzum mdzad// de tshe ji ltar gang ga'i bye snyed kyi// sangs rgyas mtha' yas zhing ni 'ad kyis khyab/ khang bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa bstar pa la/ rnamakha
156a4(mdo sde): lngas rigs log so zhes gsol te// e ma'o rgyal ba sa rdul bcom dbang po bsgoms khyed dang mnyam med gong ni yong ma yin// sangs rgyas zhing mang ngag ni rab g.yos shing / 
156a5(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i lnga ni sngar bcas shin tu rmongs// lha tshogs ma nga bo bsam pa rab dga' zhing // rgyal ba dbang ba thul la phyag 'tshal byed// ston pa'i nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che
156a6(mdo sde): ba'i mchog/ mo'u dgal bu yis rgyal la yongasu zhus pa// gang gis dpag tu med pa'i 'dzum mdzad pa// bcom ldan bde gshegs rgyu gang rkyen gang lags// me'u dag la bu yis rgyal
156a7(mdo sde): la nyer nus pa// the tsom gcod mdzad rgyal bas bka' stsal pa// nga la mchod pa byad pa'i klu 'di ni// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas 'gyur// ji snyed zhing 'di 'od kyis khyab pa dag// de dag
156a8(mdo sde): nga rgyal ba'i zhing gcig 'gyur// des na rgyal ba 'di ltar 'gyur ba ste/ 'dren po de'i ming dbang po'i rgyal mtshan// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas dag/ des ni 'gro sring ba
156b1(mdo sde): rol 'grel byed// 'di la brten nas ngas ni 'dzum pa bskum/ mo'u dag la bu khyod de ltar shes par gyis// klu de lung bstan pa ni thos na su ka bla na med ba dag gi dga' bas khab/ lung
156b2(mdo sde): bstan thob nas bar snang 'di las na/ ta la brgyad cu'i srid du mngon par 'phagos// phyogs bcu dag na rnam dag rgyal ba'i zhing // bzang la grangs med sangs rgyas des mthong ste/ 
156b3(mdo sde): mthong nas sangs rgyas rgyang gnyis mchog dag la tshogs sna tshogs dgu gis rgyal ba bstod// 'grel phan skyeng rgyal ba dag las rgyal// dbang po thul cing ma na ring bzhin
156b4(mdo sde): gsung ba'ang mdzad padan gsung bang la phyag 'tshal// kha de gshegs tshig rmongs med la phyag 'tshalo// de nos klu 'i rgyal po rgya mtshos bac+doMs la tshigs bcang pa'i
156b5(mdo sde): dbangs kyis nu ba nus pa// 'jogs sel sngangs grol bad la phyag 'tsha'o// spyad pa spyod tshe sug las kyi bgyis pas// 'jigs las grol dang 'gro ba thar
156b6(mdo sde): 'gyod pa// 'jigs sel lam zhag bdag la bka' stsal stsol// ji ltar 'dren pa bdag nyid 'jigs grol zhing // skye ba 'jigs las rab tu grel mdzad pa// khad kyis legs
156b7(mdo sde): par gsung pa'i bka' thos nas keng bzhin ngoms meng yid kyis spyad par bgyi// chu chen 'dzin pa klu yi rgya mtsho nges 'gro la phan phyir ston la zhu byed pa// 'jigs bcas zhe
156b8(mdo sde): sar bcas shing de rten nas/ mi dbang spyan sngar de sar bcas pas 'dug de mi bsam pa 'dren pas thugs chung nas// ji ltar spyang ro 'jigs dang rnam bral zhing / sems
157a1(mdo sde): dag kyang 'jigs las thar byed pa// yan lag brgyad ldan gsung gi lung bstar to// byang chub spyad pa rjesu spyong pa zhing // byug mtshon med pas 'gre la rab tu
157a2(mdo sde): ston chu dang bang dang de bzhin g.yul 'thab pa'i// 'jigs la yang dang yang du 'jigs med sbyin// de yis legs pa'i las ni byas pas ra// 'jigs pas mi 'go bang chub reg
157a3(mdo sde): 'gyur la// mnyam par bzhag pa'i byams pa'i sems kyi su// shin tu mi bzang bdud stobs rab skra byed// stobs bcu'i mkhyen pas rgya mtsho dga' nas// de yi skad cig si le pus
157a4(mdo sde): btsugs te// 'jigs par mi gnas zhi bar rab 'dug nas// / bde bar gshegs la thal spyar phyag 'tshal byed// srid kun dag la mi gnas phyag 'tshal// sdang med 'jigs bral
157a5(mdo sde): ldan la phyag 'tsha'o// sdang dang 'jigs las skye ba ba sgral bkyi zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa mi sdang bdag 'gyur bgyi// de nas klu'i rgyal po gser gtsug gis
157a6(mdo sde): bac+doMs la tshigasu bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa// drang srong chen po spyan dge dbang po thul// srid pa'i rgya che rgal cing pha rol phyin// skam la bzhugs pa sred skams gang
157a7(mdo sde): zag mchog/ 'gro ba'i don phyir khyod zhu bka' stsal stsol// ji ltar spyad na bode gshegs bdag skye zhing // rgyal ba'i bstan la rab tu gonas gyur dang / bdud phrag stong dag gis kyang
157a8(mdo sde): mi bskyod pa/ kun spyan 'di dog bdag la bka' stsal stsol// sangs rgyas tshul la mi g.yo rob gnas shing / klu yi gtso bos 'dren la de zhus pa/ klu yi 'drag pa'i bsam
157b1(mdo sde): bzugs chud nas/ nyon mongs kun spangs de ni lung bstan pa// lhag pa'i bsam pas chos kyi nges ldan zhing // nges pa stong pa'i yul la rab tu gnas/ sring las rnam rgyal
157b2(mdo sde): bstan la mi g.yo zhing // gzhal med byang chub la ni 'dun pa bskyed// gser gtsug rdzu 'phrul che ba'i klu de ni// sangs rgyas gsungs pa thos nas the tsam med// byang chub phyir
157b3(mdo sde): ni mi g.yo yid bskyed cing // 'jigs kun pha rol phyin le mngon par bsted // sring mtsho rgal cing skam la shin tu bzhags// the tsom mnga' mi g.yo brtan brnyes shing // slong bar
157b4(mdo sde): 'khor gtan bzhin du rab bzhugs pa// ri rab ri la lha yi gnas bcas bzhin// 'di ltar mi g.yo ba la skabs mchi zhing // mi g.yo ri lta bur ni 'gyur bar gyi// de
157b5(mdo sde): 'gul dang mi 'gul mi gnas kun// mi g.yo ri rab lta bur 'gyur bar bgyi// ma spang pas ni de yi thugs chung nas// yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyis lung bstan
157b6(mdo sde): par bskal pa stong phra ba rgyang cur spyad byas nas// ma 'ongs pa'i dus su sangs rgyas 'gyur// bde ba'i lam gyis rgyal bar 'gyur ba ste// mtshan ni legs mthong zhes pa
157b7(mdo sde): shin tu sdug/ srog chags bye ba steng phrag thar byed cing // bsil ba bde ba zhi ba'i lam 'god 'gyur// rgyal bas gsungs pa klu nges thos na su// gzhal med dga' ba'i sa
157b8(mdo sde): ni rab dang pos// nyon mongs zing sel cing ma smod pa// 'gro ba'i 'dren pa la ni phyag 'tshal byed// de nas klu'i rgyal po a pa la'i mig gis// bcom ldan 'das la rig
158a1(mdo sde): su bcad pa'i dbangs kyis zhu ba zhus paka/ ri mchog 'dul mdzad gzi brjid mtha' yas pa// thugs rab zhi zhing nyer 'i pha ror gshegs ka'i gnas yeR+Yar
158a2(mdo sde): rab zhi rnam grol pa// zhi bar khos pa bde bar gshegs pa gsungs// khyed sras byang chub ji ltar spyad bgyis na// zhi gnas dga' zhing zhi gnas bsten pa dang / zhi gnas la
158a3(mdo sde): ni ji ltar mkhas par 'gyur// kun gzigs myur du bdag gi som nyi khum// rgyal ba la ni klu des zhus pa dang / rgyal bas u dpal mig la lung bstan pa// gang gis dge
158a4(mdo sde): bi'i las kyis yid 'ong ba'o// zhi gnas la ni shin tu bslab par 'gyur// bde phyir byang chub sems dpa' mkha' pa ri// spyad pa spyod tshe sems g.yor mi byed cing // bskal
158a5(mdo sde): pabye bar ni gnas bstan byas pa// byang chub dang pang pa'i mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur// nga yid rab ni byang chub rtogs nasu// rnam 'drer 'gro ba'i sbyor byed
158a6(mdo sde): tsing rab tu ser sa zhi g.yo bar mi 'gyur la// seMn nyon mongs pi g.yo zhi bar byed// nges pa ud pa la mig gi klu des na// rgyal bas legs par gsungs pa'i tshig thos nas
158a7(mdo sde): nyon mongs kun g.yo yid ni ni gyur te// byang chub mchog rab sems ni bskyed gyur to// de yi zhi gnas sems la brten rasu// byang chub sems bskyed rgyal ba de la bstod// 
158a8(mdo sde): khyod la bskyed nas zhi gnas rtogs gyur tsong // shin tu yid ni sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi// de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bso// bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa'i
158b1(mdo sde): dbangs kyis nub zhus pa// bde bar gshegs pa ni gnas thugasu chud // rgyal ba gang zag mchog la bdag zhu ga// khyed nyid las 'khrungs byang chub rab gnas pa// mi mchog
158b2(mdo sde): rdoltar lhag mthing dag la spyang // mi 'dul kha lo sgyur la dga' bos zhus// klu de'i sngon gyi mtha' ni gzigaso bos na// dge ba'i las bsags pa dag thugs chung nas// 
158b3(mdo sde): mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba 'di skad gsung // ye shes dam pa byang chub mchog stsal phyir// sa zhum yid kyis nor dang 'bru dag la// ser sna med cing rdzas mang mi nyung dang / chung ma
158b4(mdo sde): dang ni bdag nyid gting bar byed// de yis legs pa'i la se debyas pa dang // gtong ba shin tu sdug bsngal brten pa sa na/ ye shes dam pa bdag rgyal sangs rgyas 'gyur/ 
158b5(mdo sde): de ni lhag mthong spyad pa'i 'bras bu yin// de nas klu'i rgya la po nyi dgas// bac+doMs la tshigasu bcad pa'i dbang sa kyis zhu ba zhus pa// 'gro ba kun gyi 'dren la
158b6(mdo sde): bdag nu pa khong sras byang chub ji ltar spyad bgyis na// zhi gnas lhag mthong mnyam par spyod pa dang // drang zing med ni byang chub 'thob 'gyur lags// 'dren pa de la klu ngas zhes
158b7(mdo sde): ba dang // zhi gnas lhag mthong yang ngag len mkhyen pa// thogs pa med pa 'dren pa 'dis brnyas pas// de ni bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan la bzhag/ byang chub sems dpa'agang
158b8(mdo sde): zhig spyad spyod tshe// gnyi ga'i stobs 'di mnyam par bsten pas na/ de ni bo ba khrag khrig mtha' yas shing // 'gro ba'i don du mnyam par rnam por sbyang // bskal pa bye bar
159a1(mdo sde): khor de 'tshang d+ha// zhing gi dang pa dag kyang 'ge 'gyur te// de'i mtha' bsngags pa bskal 'bye mang du// sangs rgyas bye bas zang par de mi spyod de tshe klu'i bdag
159a2(mdo sde): bo 'i dga' yis// theg pa mnyab pa'i bsngags pa thos rasu// gzhal du med pa'i dga' bas sems ba ras// bang chub chog gi sems rab bsred gyur pa/ 'jig rjed par
159a3(mdo sde): phyir byang chub de lung bstar/ ma 'ongs dus sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste// ling ni rgyal ba 'dren pa kun spyad do// sreg chagos bye ba stong phrag thar par byed// de ras klo'i ba ra dris pas// 
159a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcang pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu bzhus pa// ba gshegs khyeng sras ji ltar spyad bgyis ra// 'gro ba'i don du bon pa tshol ba byed cing // bang chab
159a5(mdo sde): bla ma tshol la mi skyo ga/ rkang gnyis dam pa mchog gis de lung ston// mi yi khyu mcho gau la ni klus zhus pa// klu yaM bdag po'i bsam pa thugs chud// thub pa sder
159a6(mdo sde): mtha' sbyor la mi 'jigs pas ka klu'i bdag po'i the tsom lus bstan pa// byang chub zhi ba sprad pa spyod 'dod pa// nges shing nyams pa med par spyod pa dang // bdag dang gzhan dag la yA
159a7(mdo sde): mi gnod cing // ser sna med cing gtong ldan rgyal ba yin// de yis legs pa'i las de bso pa na// 'ge ba gang gis 'khar bar bde 'dod la// nges shing thaMd du ni snying rje ldan// ner
159a8(mdo sde): byin pas ni sdud pa bde par 'gyur// de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas na// nam du 'ong skye bar sdug bsngal mong mi 'gyur// rtal tu bde bas skye ba bder 'ged la' na
159b1(mdo sde): mtho med cing gnas zhing 'jog/ ston pa'i gan sung gis klu de bskul bas na// ru chog tu dga' bas sems ni breng gyur te/ de yis skad cigs la pus gcugs nas// tshigs bcad
159b2(mdo sde): sna tshogs bdag gis rgyal bstod pa// go'u tam 'jig rten kun na mnyam ring // 'gro ba zil mnan bde gshegs lgang nga ba khod kyi zhal du lhar bcas 'gro kun lta// 'di ltar thal
159b3(mdo sde): mo sbyar nas skabasu mchi// byang chub mchog gi yid ni bskyed bgyi zhing // ji ltar bde gshegs khod kyi ye shes dang // ston pa khod kyis the tsom spel pa ltar// bdag kyang thob nas 'jig
159b4(mdo sde): rten the tsom po stsal// de nas de'i sngon gzhal med byang chub phyir// yid ni shin tu dgyes nas bka' stsal pa// 'jig / na ngan phyir 'dren par 'gyur ba yi// rir chechog ming ni nga
159b5(mdo sde): po chen po'o// de nas klu'i rgyal po I ra ba nas// btsam ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis nu ba zhus ga'ajig rten dpag med mang po'i skabs kyi mchog/ 
159b6(mdo sde): rgyal ba ze tsam gcad la 'u bgyi ba// byang chub sems dngas sug las ji bgyis ni// sangs rgyas mngon du lhan cog 'phrang ba theg 'jig rten mgan po nga la klus zhus nas// 'jig
159b7(mdo sde): rten phan phyir 'dren pas lus bstan pa// si ni rgyud kha nyon mongs rnam rig dang // yongasu dul ba'i yid ni rnam shas// 'gro la phar phyir snying rje bskyed na su// byang chub ra chag gi de
159b8(mdo sde): du spyad po spyad// bdag dang rgyal bar ji ltar 'phreng mnyam nas/ thabs la mkhas par mngon par rab gnas te// rgyal ba rnams dang bodo gshegs myo ngad 'das// sku gdung dag la
160a1(mdo sde): gnal med mchod byed cing ka/ rnam grol yid kyis slar lam 'debs par byed// de yis legs pa'i las de bas pas ra// rtag tu sangs rgyas mngon par 'brang
160a2(mdo sde): sngang rgyal ba mngon sum mchod pa byas rnaMs su ka byang chub dga' ba 'ong ldan reg par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi ni legs gsungs tshig thos ras/ A ra ba kru ni yid dgu ste/ gzhal
160a3(mdo sde): darang pa'i dga' bas sems bde nas/ ngang pa'i yid kyis sangs rgyas mngon bstod pa/ mi 'dul ba lo sgyur la phyag 'tshalo// khod kyis bdag gi sam nyi the tsal bsa'o// bang chab
160a4(mdo sde): ngang du yid 'di bskyed bgyi ste// sdug bsngal thar bgyid sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi// gang zag mchog gis klu'i bdog pa yi khas pa pa thugs chung byang chub lung
160a5(mdo sde): pa bskal pa ba ba brgyad cu rtsa bani ru// spyad pa spyad nas de nas sangs rgyas 'gyur// mi rachog mtshar ri thaMng sgra la ba ste// srog chags pa ba steng phrag thar par ba
160a6(mdo sde): de yi ring bsol mang mer 'gyur ba ste// skye bo mang po ris 'grel bar 'gyur// klu de ston pa'i gsung gas dgar gyur nas// 'jig rten par mdzad rnam 'dren mngangon bstod nga // khyod kyis
160a7(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i don ni rgya cher mdzad// sdug bsngal thar mdzad sangs rgyas phag 'tsha'o// // bam po bcu gnyis pa// de nas klu'i rgyal po cheb pa'i bus// bcom ldan 'das la tshog su
160a8(mdo sde): bcas pa'i dbangs kyis zhu ba zhes pa/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rton don slad du// 'jig rten don mdzod rnam 'dren la zhu bo// spyad pa spyod cha sug les ji bgyis pas/ ma rdegs
160b1(mdo sde): rtogs nas rgyal ba rnam 'dren 'gyur/ ching pa'i bu des rgyal la mngon zhus nas// nyon mongs thams cad 'astsal bas lung bstan pa// dge ba'i las kyis 'bras bu yid 'ong zhing / 
160b2(mdo sde): nyon mongs bcom pas nges ni rgyal zhes bya// de ni 'gro kun che dang sangs rgyas la// mchog du dad pa dag gi sebs kyang shes// de'i las kyi lam de byas pas de// 'gro ba'i brtag
160b3(mdo sde): pa rgyal ba dag tu 'gyur// de yis rgyal ba'i shad pa thos nasu// 'gro bzang la ni dad par byas// de tshe de'i dge ba byas pas na// 'di yi smon lam btab ltar bdag 'gyuraro// de nas
160b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten mgon pos de lung bstan// mi mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste// srog tshogs bye ba stong phrag por bya dacing // spyad pa spyod che rgyal ba ngon par bstod/ snyan
160b5(mdo sde): pa'i gsung gis klu de dga' gyur nas// sangs rgyas la ni ngang bskyed mngon bskyed pa// 'gro ba thar mdzad sangs rgyas phyag 'tshalo// bas pa yas bde gshegs rab
160b6(mdo sde): khyong pag 'tshal// de nas klu'i rgyal po dag pas bcom ldan 'das la tshigisu bcad pa'i dadangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa drang srong chen po skabs mchog dpag tu med// skyen dang bral
160b7(mdo sde): ning yor mchog brnyes pa// stobs bcu'i 'jigs pas rnam gol khong la ni// byang chub zhi spyod mkhas pa rab gnas na// nges pa'i nyon mongs ji ltar bsal ba dang // rgyal ba'i
160b8(mdo sde): mchog nyid ji ltar bsgom par bgyi// bdud kyi spyod yul de dag ji ltar spang // sangs rgyas spyod yul dag la ji ltar spyad// rgyal ba la ni klu des zhus nas dang // ji ltar bde gsheg
161a1(mdo sde): spyod yul spyad pa dang // ji ltar bdud kyi spyod yul spang ba dag/ las gnyis shin tu mkhyen pas rab tu bstan// ston pa la ni klu'i bdag des zhus nas// de yi
161a2(mdo sde): bsam pa thugs chud lung bstan pa// mi mkhas gang dag san 'du shes spyod// de dag nag po'i rtsa lag spyod yul spyod// gang dag sems can med cing yid mi gnas// de dag thang
161a3(mdo sde): gzigs pa'i spyod yul skyed// nag po'i rtsa lag dag las rgyal nasu// byang chub bla mang zhi ba des 'thob bo// ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dgar gyur nas// bdud kyi spyod yul myur
161a4(mdo sde): bar rnam spangs te// sangs rgyas zad gzigs pa'i spyod yul dag/ bstan pas de ni myur du rgyal bar 'gyur// de nas klu'i rgyal po goru ta nas// bcom ldan 'das la tshig
161a5(mdo sde): su bcad pa'i dbangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa// kha lo sgyur mchog khang la zhu bgyi ba// 'dren 'a khyod sras ji lta ra spyang bgyis na// klu'i ske gnas ngag ni gsod 'gyi
161a6(mdo sde): cing sangs rgyas tshul gyi myu gu skyed par bgyid// bde bar gshegs la klu des zhus pa dang // de yis bsam pa thugasu chud lung bstan pa// sen med la rgyal ba'i sras spyod cing // 
161a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems la rnams kyang ngo mi gnas// de ni stong nyid khong du chud pa yin// mkhas pa mtshan ma smon lam rnams spangs shing // mdzangs pa mi dmigs pa la gnas pa dag
161a8(mdo sde): de ni sangs rgyas chos mngon myu gu skyed// ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dgar gyur nas/ mi dmigs pa la brtan par rab gnas shing // 'dud kyi zhags bcings dam pa bcad nasu/ sa
161b1(mdo sde): rgyas tshul la klu ni rab tu gnas// 'jig rten mkhas pas byang chub de lung stan// ma 'ongs dusu sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste// rnam thar rgyal zhes phyogasu rnam grags shing // bdud
161b2(mdo sde): kyi dbang song srog chags thar par bye// ston pa'i gsung gisau klu de dga' gyur nas// thal mo sbyar nas sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal byed// khyod kyi lamau bsngar sangs rgyas bster// 
161b3(mdo sde): mchog thar mdzad zhi la phyag 'tsha'i// de nas klu'i rgyal po ka ma pa la'i sgras bac+doMs la tshigasu bcad pa'i dbangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa// zla ba'i 'od ltar ji bang mthu che zhing // 
161b4(mdo sde): mchog rang thung gyur la no bkyi ga/ nam 'dren sras ni dzi ltar spyad bgyis na// len pa la gre cing rjes skyo bar la bruM re/ gal te spong zhing sben ming rjes song zhing / 
161b5(mdo sde): phung po mtshan ma mi ldan bral ba dang // namakha' 'dra ba'i chos kyang rnam shes na// pa'i lam du bu yang rjes 'gror 'gyur// ston pas legs par gsungs pa dga'
161b6(mdo sde): nas ca rig su med pa de ni sems bskyed// 'jig rten mkhas pas byang chub de lung bstan// rje su 'thun 'ad spyod pa spang byas shing // zhing mchog dag kyang yongasu sbyangs na su kha 'ongs
161b7(mdo sde): dusu sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste// zla bas lhag par phyog su rnam grags shong / srid par 'gro ba'i sems can thar par byed// ka ma pa la zhes ming btags klu ri/ shAkya sras madz+ra
161b8(mdo sde): byang chub lung bstan nas/ sems ni dga' zhing yongasu yod bgu ste/ 'gro kun thar par mdzad la mngon bstod ba// thub pa tsha la 'di lta skyab su 'tshigasangs rgyas 'jung
162a1(mdo sde): the tsom bdag ma mchis// bun pa dag la sgron pa gzung bgyi zhing // 'ong ba rig ma mchis la lam bstan bgyi// de nas klu'i bdag po yul 'khor bsrung gis/ 
162a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa'i dbangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa// bgon po 'jig rten long bar gyur pa'i mig mig sbyin sman pa drang srong tsho la zhus// gang gis 'jig rten rnam par
162a3(mdo sde): lam bzang zhing // zhi ba'i sar mtsho rkang gnyis dbang po gsungs// stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' rnam par thar pa'i lam ston pa// 'jig rten regon pa rkang gnyis dbang pas de
162a4(mdo sde): lung bstan gang gis yun rings zhugs pa'i sdug pa sngal lam zhi zhing // 'khor ba nyer zhe mya ngan 'das pa gsal bar 'gro// stor la klu'i rgyal pos lam zhe
162a5(mdo sde): nas su// sdug bsngal ba la snying rje dam paskyed pas shing // klu'i rgyal bas byang chub 'dun pa drag bskyed/ stobs bcu stobs 'chang 'jig rten mgon du
162a6(mdo sde): bdag 'gyur bad// stengs btsa'i yonan mnga'o bso klu dbang lung bstan pa// mi yi sing+ge bdag nyid mu stegs dgrar 'gyur zhing // sems can mtha' yas dpag med 'ber bar 'gro ba dag
162a7(mdo sde): bde gshegs mchog gi tshig gis 'dren cing thar bar byed// ston pa'i gsung mchog klu'i rgyal pos thos nas su// dga' ba'i sems kyis sor bcu'i rtse mo thal sbyar te// mi dbang 'jig rte
162a8(mdo sde): mgon po drang srong chen po 'a// gas bskyed nas 'khrul med tshig gis mngon pasto dang // skyabs mchog shin tu thugs gzhungs mtshungs med ye shes tog/ 'ge ba'i dge ba spyad cing dge
162b1(mdo sde): yun ring dang // 'go ba'i bsam pa mtha' yas khyod kyis thugs chad pas// des na mi dbang khyod ni 'jig rten rgya cher grags// de nas klu'i rgyal po gser mgrin gyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshig
162b2(mdo sde): su bcang ba'i dbyangs kyis zhu bzhus pa// stobs bcu stobs mnga' stobs cha stobs dang ljon pa ste / zugs dge sdang mdzad 'od dang ldan zhing sdig mi mnga'/ srid rgyal blo gros bzang bas 'a
162b3(mdo sde): bshin tu ma ngon// rgyal ba dge sbyong shin tu dri med zhal gsungs shig/ mi mchog rdul bral khyed sras ji ltar spyad bgyis na// mkhas pa'i ma dkrugs ma bskyod pa dag thugs chud
162b4(mdo sde): rgyal ba rje lo dpag med brgyan yongasu mkhyen// rgyal sras skye bo phan mdzad thugasu chung pa'i spyan// bla gros dpag med mnga' ba lha mi mkhas pa yis// bla mar bgyis
162b5(mdo sde): rgyal ba dpag medang sa yas bskor// mkhas pa dusu 'gro ba dpag med phan mdzad dgongs// stobs bcu mnga' ba klu yi 'gro ba zhus pa gsungs// bla 'tshal bral
162b6(mdo sde): zhing blo gtsang rgyas dgongs bdug pa mdzod// nga yi sras mchog rgyal brten rga shi zad byed pa// 'thob cing rgyal bas mchod cing rdul meng skyon brel reg/ 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal dpag sde
162b7(mdo sde): brgya shes yongasu 'grol// stobs bcu'i blo gros mnga' las klu'i bdag po yis/ rga shi zad pa thos nas rab tu yid dga' ste// 'gro la phan yid byang chub ying byas rgyal ba'i
162b8(mdo sde): mchog rnam 'dren blo mnga' 'gro la phan mdzad mngon bsod pa 'gro ba mang ba'i bur bar ba'i 'i long tog dag/ gcing mdzad 'gro 'di'i sdug bsngal 'joms shing mun pa dang / 
163a1(mdo sde): / rab rib ling ngogasal mdzad bdud ci lar// shin tu dri med spyan mnga' dag pa phyogs bskur ston// klu'i bdag po'i gser dang la lnga bu'i lam gshegs shing yang
163a2(mdo sde): dan dang ga mad mnga' ba shin tu thugasu chung // blo gros sgrol mdzad 'od zer stob 'da'i spyan ranga' zhal// me 'khrul ma glengs pa spad gzi cher mkhas pa'i gzi stobs bcu 'od te
163a3(mdo sde): ranga' la 'gro ba'i tshig gis bstod// rgyal mchog bdag bde ldan sangs rgyas byang chub nas// 'gro ba 'khams shing mgan reng rga shi sdug bsngal gyis/ nyam thag sdug bsngal dpag
163a4(mdo sde): meng bsal te thar par bgyi/ bde dang zhi rang zhi ba brtul reng rgya che spel gzhi pa'i lam du zhugs nas bdag ri sangs rgyas bgyisargyal pa brgya yis thugs chad bdang kye sdebs dga'i
163a5(mdo sde): stobs med bgyi zhing rimakhas pa dag gzhug par bgyi / de nas klu'i rgyal po mgrin sder gyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa'i dbangs kyis zhu de nus pa/ ster
163a6(mdo sde): mchog mi 'dal kha lo sgyur la zhu bgyib// 'dren pa khod kyi sras ni ji ltar spyad bgyis ni kha na ma the med cing zhi la rdul bral dang // nyen mongs red cing byang chub dam mchog sangs
163a7(mdo sde): rgyas 'gyur// 'gro ba'i don du 'dren pas gsungs pa gang // dpa' bo khyed nyid las 'brangs sras thob nas// kha na ma tho med cing / bdag dang gzhan// sangs rgyas 'gyur dang dang
163a8(mdo sde): chub thetsal khum// ra bIn sngon klu nga yas sa ni zhus pa dang / 'jig rten kun la chags pa med pa'i thugs/ chos rnams kun la mi 'jigs dbang brnyas shing // ston pa'i gsung li
163b1(mdo sde): legs gnas lung bstan pa// nga'i sras 'jig rten gsum la ma chags shing // 'gro la phan par spyad pa spyod bad pa// 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams ngag dang / gzug
163b2(mdo sde): rang khamasu la cad du mi sbyar/ mya ngan 'das dbyings gzhal med 'dus ma byas// bad kyi ni sdug bsngal bad cing 'gag/ de ni zhang bzung 'jig rten gos med ying rgyal brgyal
163b3(mdo sde): ba'i dbang po rab tu sgom// de yis logs pa'i las de byas pas na// gos pa med cing 'jigs med rnams spyod pa// bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa med gnas de/ bdag nyid bla med
163b4(mdo sde): byang chub mngon 'tshang rgya// da ni rnams sprin de'i las rjes 'thun pa/ shin tu dka' bas byang chub 'ching rgyar 'gyur// de yi spyi ba srog chags lha dang k+Sha la~M da
163b5(mdo sde): srin po dag gis mi mthong ngo // klu mgrin sngon po stobs dwe cha de ni// sangs rgyas kun mkhan gsung gis dga' gyur nas/ ser mo btsu'i bal sbyar rag btud de/ 
163b6(mdo sde): 'jog rten sgron mdzad 'dren la phyag 'tshal byed // mi mchog la ni 'di ltar bdag skyabs mtsho// yang kyo rjesu sras kyang mchi bgyi zhing // mthar bgyid bcom la byang chub 'tshong
163b7(mdo sde): bgyid sems can sdug bsngal chos kyis gnod gyur dgrol// 'jig rten mkhas pas byang chub de lung bstar// khad ni ma 'ongs ngasu 'tshang rgya ste// kun tu sbyar zhes pagasu rnar
163b8(mdo sde): dwags shing // 'gro ba'i srid las sems can grol bar byed // de nas klu'i rgyal po 'jigs sgrogs kyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcang po'i nga'angs kyisi rna ba 'a
164a1(mdo sde): yang 'dul la la snang ba maud las 'das// ste pa sug las kyi bkyis bdag su'o// rgyal ba de ni snam phyogs gzigs pan/ dkyil 'khe tsal gyis ning du du 'gyur
164a2(mdo sde): sa langs pa'i rgyal bas de lung bstan// kun mkhan mkhyen pas bsam pa thugs chud nas// bla na med pa'i thugs ni bskyed// de bzhin mi mchog gis ri 'di'i lung bstar/ bde ba 'byung ba dag
164a3(mdo sde): gis las bas shing // de dag snga na chad yang dang yong dran pas// de'i rnam smin las ni 'di ltar shes// de yi gzigs par sa ri 'gyur ba yin// rgyal bas legs gsungs tshig ri thos nas su// 
164a4(mdo sde): klu rgyal de ni mchog tu dga' gyur nas// 'phags pazang zing med pa'i dga' bskyed// nga rgyal bcol na sangs rgyas phyag 'a tshal bad// de nas klu'i rgyal po gzi car gyis// bcom ldan
164a5(mdo sde): 'das la tshig su btsad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu bzhus ga lam stor pa la lam ni rab ston cing / 'jig rten ngon mdzad 'dre na lo zhu 'gyi ba/ sngon cha dag tu 'phrin las ci mdzad na/ 
164a6(mdo sde): ji ltar dgongs pa bzhin du zhi gnas mdzad// 'jig rten mgon po rgyal bas de lung bstan// sems can klu ni gdul ba'i dus bab cing // 'gro ba thaMd la ni phan pa'i phyir// 'dren pa 'dud stobs
164a7(mdo sde): 'joms pas lung bstan pa// 'das pa'i dus pang spyad spyod pa'i tshe// tshul bzhin ma yin sems dang gnyer min pa'i// nams kyang mi sems rtag tu zhi gnas bstan// de la ngas ni yun
164a8(mdo sde): ring bslabs pa yin// de bzhin rgyal ba dag gi mchod rten la// 'phreng ba rin chen dag ni bkram zhing phul// de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas na// nyon mongs sems dang rnams kyang
164b1(mdo sde): gangs khachis brgal bstong phrag pa bdu// gzhan la banod pas rnams kyang banod ma byas/ nga ning yi las kyi rnam smin d+hus/ ji ltar bsams bzhin ni gnas bsten pa byed khwa
164b2(mdo sde): phreng che bas lung bstan 'di thos nas// gzi can klu ni dga' bar gyur pa na/ gzhal du med pa'i bde bas sems dga' nas// ston pa'i mdun 'dug tshig su bcad pas bstod// 'gra
164b3(mdo sde): ba'i kun ldang nyon mongs zhi mdzad cing // de dag sems zhi khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad// thub pa nyon mongs med par 'jig rten spyod// zla 'od lta burare blo zhi phyag 'tshalo// de nas klu'i
164b4(mdo sde): rgyal po rnam par snang byed kyis// bcos la tshigasu bca dpa'i dbangs kyis zhu bzhus pa sngon tshe dag tu 'phrin las ci mdzad na// thub pa khyod kyi sku la rdul mi gos// dpe med rnam
164b5(mdo sde): gnod 'di dag bdag la gsungs// gang dag thos nas nga ge bo'i las spyad pas// rnam par snang byed dge ba tshol ba'i klus/ 'jig rten mgon de la ni zhus pa dang / nyon mongs
164b6(mdo sde): kun sel yan lag brgyad ldan zhing // snyan cing 'jebs pa'i sgras ni lung bstan pa// nga yis sngon chad bong chub tshol ba na// nams kyang tshul bzhin ma yin sems mi bsams// rnams
164b7(mdo sde): kyang rab tu nyes sems ngas ma bskyed// bla med bams las yang dang yang du byas// nga yis dge ba'i las de bas pas na// bla med byang chub zhi ba reg nas su// mi mchog rgyal ba thub pa'i
164b8(mdo sde): sku dag dang / na bza' la yang rdul gyis mi gas so// rgyal ba'i 'phrin las dge bsags de thos nas// rnam por sdang byed klu ni yid dga' ste/ sor bcu'i thal mo sbyar nas mag ba lnga
165a1(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i zhabs la mngon par phyag 'tshal byed// legs rgyal ba mu bang sngon du gshegs khyed kyi rgya che mtha' yas der ngag mdzad/ srid pa'i chags la ngags sdug bsngal hU~M/ 
165a2(mdo sde): gdungs pa'i 'gro ba mtha' dag khod kyis dkrol// skye bo dug gdug reg pa'i sman pa ste// skye bo'i dug com khong ni gso sman lags// me 'bar zhi ltar rim gyis mi ngan 'da'// 'di
165a3(mdo sde): ltar thal star thal sbyar mgo so btad skyabasu mtsho// de nas klu'i rgyal po bsgyings pas bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad ba'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhes pa rnamo 'dren dge ba'i
165a4(mdo sde): 'drin las ci mdzad na// zhabs ni shin tu mnyam zhing ba rten pa brnyes// gang dag thos ras shin tu yid dga' bog// mi yi mchog gyur de dag bdag la gsungs/ klu yi rgyal po
165a5(mdo sde): bsgyings pas rdor 'dren/ 'jig rten mkhas la de yis zhus pa dang // yid du 'ong ba'i tshigs bcang sna tshogs kyi sa/ k+Sha yi rgyal po'i yang mi dga' bar gyu nga mi
165a6(mdo sde): tshal khrims brtul zhigs rnam ngag bsgrubs/ nga yis gzhan yang tshul khrims brtul zhags bsgoms/ ngas ni dge ba'i las de byas pas na// rkang pa mnyam pa dag gis sa la reb da

165a8(mdo sde): rgyal ba 'od mdzad rdul bcom zhing // shin tu nyon mongs bag chags bcas pa bcom// zla nyi'i dkyil 'khor sgra gcan gyis btang ltar/ nga ga bcom nas ni phyogs rnams rab tu gsal
165b1(mdo sde): de nas klu'i rgyal po 'od chen gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshig su 'bad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten sman slang du// 'jig rten 'das gsung 'dren lan
165b2(mdo sde): bgyi ba/ rkang gnyis dam pa sug las ci bgyis na/ rnam 'dren gnas ma lags pa 'tshal ba 'bog// sngon tsha dag tu spyad pa spyod pa ma// lus dang ngag yid dang ni sems kyis kyang khade ba
165b3(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i yang dag las bas te// las gang byas pas rnams kyang gdang mi 'gyur// rab tu dga' zhing dge bas brlan pa dang // gnas ma yin pa'i lam gyong zad ni/ dge ba bcu'i
165b4(mdo sde): las kyi rnam par sbyangs// gnas ma yin pa'i nyan mongs thams cad bcom// rnam 'dron de yis las de mdzad pas ma/ 'di nas 'phos nas gzhan 'phrul dag tu gshegs mi
165b5(mdo sde): mi 'jig rten brnyes nas der 'das te/ bla med gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'thag gnas ma yin pa shes la na mas kyang ri// ba ba khrag khrig bdud kyi skyang ri 'as/

165b7(mdo sde): meng pa'i bangade bas sems dga' nas// yan+tan kun gyi pha rol gshegs la phag 'tshal 'ang / shin tu thugs rdul yid gnyis 'joms pa po// 'dam las rgal cing skab la shin tu
165b8(mdo sde): bzhags// thub cher rgal cing 'gro ba sgrol mdzad pa// ji ltar nyi mas mur pa gosal nas so// gzugs kyi rnam pa snang zhing gsal ba ltar// de bzhin ston pa'i thugs ri rnam thal
166a1(mdo sde): / zhing sems can sdug bsngal mang gnang thar mdzad ga/ mig sbyin gas pa'i dbyad la phyag 'tshal/ de nas klu'i rgyal ba rab tu gdang byed kyi mtshas la tshig
166a2(mdo sde): bcad pa'i dbangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa// rgyal ba gser mdog phrin las ci mdzad na// dus gsum mkhan la rab tu bstan par bzhugs// ram kha' lta bur ro len lda du bgyis pa/

166a4(mdo sde): shin tu thugs chung ngu ni lung bstan pa/ rtag tu dge ba dran ldan sten byed cing // nges pa'i las byas pas ni ba de 'thung dang // rtag tu gzhan yang shes la 'jog par
166a5(mdo sde): cing bangag nyid rje tsam shes pa ser sna med// mkhas pa de yis las de bas pas na// las zhig nas ni gzhan 'phrul dag tu 'gre// 'dod ba dag na spyod pa'i lha rnams
166a6(mdo sde): dang zur du 'bab cing mi'i bar du 'byung // dus gsum shes la rnam par rtse bod cing // bdag dang de bzhin gzhan yang shes par byed// lpags pa srab cing blo dang ldan gyur pa khang
166a7(mdo sde): gshegs thogs pa med pas lung bstan te// shin tu blo ldan mchog gis bstan thos nas/ klu chen rab tu gdung byed dga' gyur te// bong chub gzhal du med la rab gnas shing // yang
166a8(mdo sde): ngag bsngags pas mi mchog rgyal ba stong // dus gsum mtshan nyid gcig tu gzigs mdzad cing // las dang rnam smin de bozhini rab tu mkhyen// sems can dag gi khang par de
166b1(mdo sde): bam bye/ de gshegs thams cad gtong la phyag 'tshal// de nas klu'i rgyal po stobs chen gyis bsam ldan 'das la tshig su bsnang ba'i dngos kyis nu ba nus pa la lungs
166b2(mdo sde): rab ma na rab mtha' yas pa// mgon pa rdul grol thugs ni yang su dag/ bdag gi sam nyi myur sol the tsam yang / skye bar dgus phyir bang ba ra gshegs pas gsus// ji ltar sto
166b3(mdo sde): tsher mi dang lnga dag gis// sug las bgyis pa blo mkhas ji ltar 'tshal/ ji ltar bla med byang chub mchog theb pa// bdag gi the tsam zhus pa myur bar gsungs// stobs bcu'i stobs
166b4(mdo sde): mkhyen bdag nyid shin tu nges// rgyal la klu'i sa zhus pa sbyar gsungs te/ nga yis ji ltar mi yi spyod kun dang // dge ba'i bsam pas byang chub tshal byed cing // ji ltar ying rab dga'

166b7(mdo sde): zhib rab tu bsngar// bong ba'i lam gyis byang chub zhi ba bkur// stobs bcu'i lam mchog rab tu bstan bya zhing // yun ring mi dag gi ni don 'gyur ba de ltar brtan pa des ni snying rje bskyed/ drang
166b8(mdo sde): srong chen po'i ngag tshul bsgrubs nasu mgo dang miyi dang de bzhin sha dag ni// btang nas bde gshegs lom nas dpa' bo 'ag/ sngon gyis du su mi yis spyang pa ri tshe rmi lam lto bur
167a1(mdo sde): rab tu ma ban// dag pa 'di dag mi yis shes pa ra// stobs bsku mnga' la mchod partson par byed// mgon la gzhal med de bzhin dang bskyed na// ji ltar 'gro kun dgon du bdag
167a2(mdo sde): 'gyur snyam/ ji ltar skye ba pangs che bdag gis ni// stob pa bcus brten pa'i lam la gzhag par bya/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag bsten pa na// 'dre nga dag gos spyad la rjesu bslab/ bskal pa
167a3(mdo sde): ba drag khrig mtha' yos su// lam gol song ba rnams la ma mchog bstar// 'di ltar bdag nyid cher po'i spyad spyod na/ mi yis sngon gyis 'phrin las byas pa mthong // rmi lam lta bur
167a4(mdo sde): byas par rnam rig cing // de ni dran la pha rol dag la 'ang ste na// stobs bcu mnga' ba'i bka' ni thos nas su// stobs chen klu ni yid dga' mgur gyur nas// sor bcu'i thal
167a5(mdo sde): mau spyi bor sbyar btud// byang chub zhi thob pa phyir rgyal ba stong // rnam par 'dren la bdag gis dang bskyed pas// stobs pa cu'i mdzad pa dag ni bdag gis bgyi// skye bo lam gel
167a6(mdo sde): 'gro zhing mur gyur rnamaso// byang chubazhi 'i thob par bdag gis bgyi// de nas klu'i rgyal po sprir cher pos bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcang ba'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ stobs bcu mnga'
167a7(mdo sde): bskye bo yongs grol mdzad// 'dren par 'byung la ni bdag 'di zhu// ji ltar ston pa'i sras kyis brtson bskyed na// zhi ba rdul med byang chub mchog thob 'gyur// ji ltar 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus
167a8(mdo sde): stobs kyi su// bla yang byang chub byang chub sems thob pa// yo d+han dpag med ye shes mchog mnga' ba'i// drang srong chen pos sros zhus lung bstan pa// byang chub don dung yis sngon spyad
167b1(mdo sde): 'ji ltar 'gro ba ram su spobs btsur brjir// brtson 'grus stobs kyis byang chubangs brnyes gde ring yis sung bang 'grang ba drug 'das pa'i dusu r-i'i dang ga zung bani i mi nga chu
167b2(mdo sde): mi bang stobs 'chang zhesa'i na cher bdur yong bu dang ldan pa ste/ bdag las skyes pa khri phrag brgya dag zung /  tshe'i'ajig rten khams 'di 'ang rgyas pasde bong bdag cas sa
167b3(mdo sde): zhing dag byung // der ni mi mchog rang byung byung gyur pa// rin chen dpal zhes 'jig rten sgra rnams grags// mi mchog de yi nyar thos dge 'dun ni/ sa sa phrag ni brgyad cu dag zung ngo // bde
167b4(mdo sde): gshegs mchog gi rdzas skyes sras tshogs ni// nyen mongs khro dang nga rgyal 'chab bral ba'o// de tshe mi mchog de yi byang chub sems/ sa ya phrag ni brgyang cu dag byung ste// rgyal ba dpag
167b5(mdo sde): med dag la spyad bu zhing // 'gro la phan par byang chub thob 'gyuro// de na rnam par 'dren pa de yi ni// byang chub sem sa dpa' bdud sten zhes bya byung // drang srong chen po ba
167b6(mdo sde): stobs rab 'jom pa// de yi tshogs kyi gtso bo de bodo// de nas bdud stobs bsnyen par dka' zhes pa// lha'i bu byung nas 'dren pa rgyal ba'i mchog/ de ni byang chub mchog tu gshegs pa'o/ 
167b7(mdo sde): ji ltar mi reg pa phyir bar chad byed// sa 'ang rgya mtshor bcas pa yo d+har ldan// de dag bud med tshogs kyis mngon sprul te// bzang mo yonan rab mchog 'dzin pas bkang // dga' ba'i
167b8(mdo sde): tshig dang yid 'ong tshig smra zhing / rig ri babang la 'gros kyang ldem bag can// glang po'i sna ltar lag mnyam dag pa'i mdog/ yun ring dag tu brtul zhugs 'dzin pa sde/ ra la sra
168a1(mdo sde): la legs dang ldan pa yin// ngag tshig smad cing pa rung ba'i rig/ se yi 'brang ba thags ngab 'chang bste/ b+hu ru'i rangag ltar la dwa di radzes pa yin// bzhin dang 'gras
168a2(mdo sde): padag ni mdzes dang ldan// bzhin gyi mdog ri zla ba dri meng 'dreg 'dzum zhing tshig ni snad pa gtong ba ste// glang mchog mas pa lta bur 'dzes pa'i 'gres// ri ma shes pas blo gros ngar
168a3(mdo sde): sbas// du ma sra ring tshig gis zir pa ste/ 'iri dgas rgyal po lta bur de'i lus 'chang // bzang ba'i lus nges srab cing 'jam dang ldan// ri dwags rgyal po'i rini 'dre rtsa 'gro zhing / rkang pa mnyam
168a4(mdo sde): la 'jol ba'i thabasu 'gro// 'dod chags ldang bar 'gyur ba'i bu me dag/ bdud kyi sa rnams thams cad gang bas pa// dam bzung ngu ldan pa'i mes pa ste/ bdud kyis bdud kyi zhags pa bdun du
168a5(mdo sde): bstan de yi 'dod pa bdud stobs thams cad dag/ de tshe bskyed nas bdud bsder 'jigs pas kyang // nag po'i rtsa lag de yis gas pa rus// bar chad ba par rab tu la tshugs// 
168a6(mdo sde): deras shing tu pi bzang srin pa ri/ khe bdag gis tshig rtsub spro bar byed// dpag tu rad cing bas pa yas mu med pa'i// lus bong mtha' yas mdzad sbrul tshig banub smra// mdung thung mda' ba tsha yis rgyab
168a7(mdo sde): shig rgyab// 'di yi klang ba myur du ri yaMs chom// 'di yi snying la gzi brjid yod pa phrogs// myur du dus las 'da' zhi 'geg par gyis/ thang cig tsa la yang 'di ni sreg le sbyor// ji ltar 'dod pa'i
168a8(mdo sde): yon tan de bsten na// bdag gi rgyal srid gnod pa med par 'gyur// nga yi yang dag tshig de thi sa nas su// rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'phel bar ra byed cig/ de tshe bang bu'i rnam pa mngon sprul pa/ mgo gcig
168b1(mdo sde): ba dang mgo gnyis pa dag byung // srin po rnams ni sgra bo che dag 'bod// la la mdung dang mda' bo che dag thogs// la la ngag kyang ri ni khar ba ste// la la sdang ba'i sems kyis sbrul 'dzin cing // de
168b2(mdo sde): yi mdun du shin tu dag 'dir// de tshi la la gnod sbyin mngon sprul te// lus gcig pa dang lus gnyis lag pa ni// gsum dag yod cing khus bzhi lag pa gcig/ de tshe lus gcig mngon par
168b3(mdo sde): sprul pas shing // de tshe de bzhini dge bzhi mngon par sprul// de nas lus cig mngon par sprul byas te/ de dag bong 'ur dang bi la dang // stag gi gdeng snga 'jigs par byed pa dag/ so so mo 'dra ba'i
168b4(mdo sde): snying dag 'byin/ khong bu'i gdang ni ri'i skad 'byir cing // ri gdo nga ni bong bu'i skad 'byor la// khung bu glang ba'i skad dang rta skad la byin// bong bu gcig gi kha ras skad kun 'byir// de che
168b5(mdo sde): yi kha nas thams cad skad// shin tu 'jigs skad dngag tu med pa 'byin// gzhan yang bde gshegs bsnyengs par bya ba'i phyir// glang pa'i kha nas tshig drab dpag reng
168b6(mdo sde): 'byin// de tshe glang po bong bu skad 'byin cing // de bzhin rta dang de bzhin glang po ngag/ rnam pa mtha' yas skad dag 'byin byed kyang // bde gshegs pa spu'i khung bu'ang ma g.ye so// rje ni glang po'i
168b7(mdo sde): skad dag 'byin byed cing // de bzhin spre'u ni rta'i skad dag 'dir// spre'u'i kha ras mtha' yas skad 'dir kyang // bong gshegs pa spu'i khung yang g.yas ma gyur// ri dgas rgyal po wa'i skad
168b8(mdo sde): 'byin cing gi khong bu thugs dang ba byi rta skad 'byir// de cha rom 'dren gas par ba nus shing // ba spa'i khung bu g.yos par ma gyur to// de tshe staga'i bag gi skad 'brir cing // ji cha phyugs pa
169a1(mdo sde): ba ni sbrul skad 'bin// rnam 'dren de ni gtse bar ma nus shing // khar chang ba bdag tu'ang ma tshug so// ri dgas khyu mchog seng+ge'i skad 'byin cing // bi la wa ri pag gi skad
169a2(mdo sde): 'byin la/ a he dag ni stag gi skad 'bon kyang // 'jig rten mkhas la bar chad pa ma nuso// de bzhin phyugs kyi kha nas mtha' yas pa// rnam pa ba ba sems can skong 'bin kyang // rnam 'ad
169a3(mdo sde): de ni gtsa bar ma nus shing // bar tshang ba ba dag tu'ang ma tshug so// stag ni ri dag so khyu mchog skad 'byin cing // de bzhin bong bu'i skad dang rta'i skad/ de tshe dom ni seng+ge'i skad 'byin kyang / 'jig
169a4(mdo sde): rten pan mdzad pa spa'i khung ma g.yos// ded ni namakha' lding gi skad 'byin cing // de tshe de bzhin glang po rta skad 'ab ni// rnam 'dren de ni gtse bar ma nus shing // bar chad ba bdag tu'ang
169a5(mdo sde): mtshug so// namakha' lding ni bu thug skad 'don cing / de dzi/ na ne tso phyogs bzhon skad 'byin la// ne bo'i skad ni yang nga ga skad 'byir byed// shang shang he 'u'i skad rnams phyin
169a6(mdo sde): par byed/ de tshe ka la bing ka'i skad yang dag ngo che mtshan mo gang la zhe sa'i skad// de che nyam su dgo' ba rma bya'i skad// de bzhin can tsa'i skad dang shugs kyi skang // phyugs bzhon zhe si'i skad
169a7(mdo sde): ngag 'byin par byed/ de tshe ka la bing ka yid 'ong dga'// ko ka'i tshig rtsub dag ni 'byin byed kyang // rgyal po'i thugs ni gzhan du ma gyur to// sbrul ni glang po'i skad dag 'byin bad cing // 
169a8(mdo sde): bzhin glang po sbrul gyi skad 'byin kyang // rnam 'dren de la gtse bar ma nus shing // bar chad bya ba dag tu'ang ma tshug so// de tshe ngang ba seng+ge'i skad 'byin cing // de bzhin khyim pa khro yi skad 'di
169b1(mdo sde): kyang rnam 'dren de la gtse bar ma nus shing // bar chad ba dag tu'ang ma tshug so// rta ni dre'u yi skad dag 'byin byed cing // de bzhin tsan tsa go bo'i skad 'byin kyang // rnam 'dir de la gtse bar
169b2(mdo sde): mnus shing // bar chad pa bdag tu'ang ma tshug so// glang po 'ug pa tsan tsa'i skad 'byin cing // bya dang khyu mchog skad 'byin khrung khrud skad// de tsho bya rgod 'ji mo'i skad 'byin cing
169b3(mdo sde): bya dang khyu mchog rje re'i skad 'byin la// dang po'i kha nas skad rnams thams 'byin// de bzhin bu thug gnod sbyin kun gyi skad 'byon cing / de bzhin kha gcig na sa'i skad kun 'di
169b4(mdo sde): khaM yi rnam pa de las de skad 'dini// skad gcig tu ni ma tha' yas skad 'byin kyang // rnam 'dren de la gtse bar mi nus shing // bar chad byed pa dag tu'ang ma tshugaso// klu yi
169b5(mdo sde): nas rdo'i char 'babs shing // de bzhin mtshon cha drag pa 'char 'a'ababs kyang // rnam 'dren de la gtse bar ma nu sa shing // b.ro chang byeng pa dag tu'ang ma tshugs/ 'am
169b6(mdo sde): sbyin kha nas rdo'i char 'bebs la// de bzhin ri dang phyag dang char 'bebs kyang // bde gshegs bar chad pa bar ma ru so// grul bum mda'i char dang de bi zhon du// de 'bar dang ni mtshon char
169b7(mdo sde): 'bebs kyang / rnam 'dren de la letse bar ma nus shing // bar chad byed pa dag tu'ang ma chug so// de tshe bdud ni sdig car de yi su// shin tu mi bzang rnam pas btses byas kyang // rtson
169b8(mdo sde): 'grus dpag meng stobs ni bskyed pa su bdud stobs ston pa byang chub rtogs par chud// rab byung gis ni bdang sde spa bkong zhing // ljon mchog drung du skyil mo dper yang bcas/ s+thAr
170a1(mdo sde): pa rlung gis par wAr bcom na su// byang chub mchog reg skye dgu thugasu chang // de tshes ni rnam drug rab g.yos shing // bsnyan par dka' ba'i sde de pags 'tshal
170a2(mdo sde): rlung gi rgyal pos bya ni khyer ba ltar// bde bar gshegs pa'i gzi yis rnam par bcom klu dang gnang sbyin srin po de dag gis// de tshe sna tshogs gdong ni mngon par sprul// de dag bdud
170a3(mdo sde): ston pa'i gzi brjid kyis// kha ni bya ba yod pa de dag bcom// ji ltar nga yis bdud kyi bu mo bcom// bud med 'di dag bdag nyid der rgas nas// de bzhin bdud stobs bsnyen dka' rang gis
170a4(mdo sde): spyi la/ bdud stobs ston pa'i mthu yos bcom par thur/ 'dag shegs mchog la lha yis bus sprul bkang // 'jig rten/ rnam par 'drer bas zi'i gyis rar na// lha yi bu me khA
170a5(mdo sde): drag brgya cu kun/ bdud bstan pas ni byang chub dag la bcud/ rnam par 'dul cing byang chub ri g.yo nas// de che bsnyen pa ra bka' ba sdug bsngal gyur// de yi chen 'dud sngon nga
170a6(mdo sde): nas su 'gro ba de dag bdag gis grol bar byas// de ltar nga yis brtson 'grus bskyed pas// de che bsnyen par bka' ba'i bdud las rgyal// rdul bral zhi mchog byang chub tshol ba ni// nga yi
170a7(mdo sde): sras kyis de ltar bslab par bya// sems can bye ba mang po'i don bya zhing // nams kyang bdag gi phyir ni bde mi ga// ji ltar mgo la me 'bar gzhan mi sems// skyes bus zhi ba lta bur brtson 'grus
170a8(mdo sde): skyedas de ltar zhi ba mchog dag tshal ba na// yid kyis yid kyis rnam pa bsam par byas// de nas klu'i rgyal ngo zla ba chen po bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zha ba zhes
170b1(mdo sde): nga li dang lha yi ston pa kha la sgyur// lha dang bcas pa 'gro 'di'i 'dren pa ste// ji ltar bde gshegs bdag 'khrungs dran ldan pa// bla med byang chub thob pa bdag gi zhu// 'dren nga thub pas 'dir
170b2(mdo sde): ni sred las rgyal// ji ltar dran ldan 'de gshegs bdag las 'khrungs// bdud ni rmongs mdzad ma ngan 'das reg pa// rgyal ba gang zag mchog gos de'i lung bstan// dran pa nye bar gzhag la drar
170b3(mdo sde): bsdams na// nyes bcas 'khor pa'i 'gro ba 'gag par 'gyur// skye bo mo mkhas gang la tshogs gyur pa// de ba rab tu mi shas sdug bsngal reg/ dran pa nyams pa 'khor ba de dang der/ 
170b4(mdo sde): mkhas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rje su dran// rmongs pa de ni thar pa'i 'gro mi shes// nyon mongs bdud kyi spyod yul dga'// log pa rnam par shems pa'i yid kyisu// yi rtag nag dang sngag
170b5(mdo sde): bsngal bde ba dang // bdag med bdag dang mi gtsang gtsang \u0f7fnang // nyon mongs bdud kyi yul las mi 'grol lo/ 5nyams de dag gi ni 'gro ba shes// dran pa nye gzhag
170b6(mdo sde): lam ni rab tu shes// spyad pa skyed tsha 'gro la drar ba'i phyir// byang chub byed pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa klus thos nas// byang chub gzhal du med la 'dun pa bskyed// k+Sha
170b7(mdo sde): chen zla bas mi 'dul kha lo sgyur// dran pa nye bar gnog saso rgyalo ba bstod// dran pa nyams pa'i 'gro ba 'dren pa lags// dran stobs shin tu gnas la phyag 'tsha'o// byang chub ga 'am
